title: Really a chat ban for this??
body:
Game 1
Elski: Whats the matter
Elski: I ban what I like to ban
Elski: That is why you all can ban what you want
Elski: So move on
Elski: And reported
Elski: Ty Kha
Elski: Enjoy your ban
Elski: Sorry
Elski: You had your pick when banning
Elski: So I picked mine
Elski: Learn to build a bridge
Elski: And stop being toxic
Elski: and
Elski: I CAN
Elski: BAN
Elski: W/E I WANT
Elski: I
Elski: Can
Elski: Ban
Elski: What
Elski: Ever
Elski: I
Elski: Want
Elski: To
Elski: Ban
Elski: I
Elski: Can
Elski: Ban
Elski: What
Elski: Ever
Elski: I
Elski: Want
Elski: To
Elski: Ban
Elski: I
Elski: Can
Elski: Ban
Elski: What
Elski: Ever
Elski: I
Elski: Want
Elski: To
Elski: Ban
Elski: Kha... I can ban what ever I want to ban.
Elski: You cannot report someone for that
Elski: no
Elski: I am not " trolling "
Elski: I am having a bad game
Elski: Kha you are toxic
Elski: and you will be ban for it
Elski: GP if you want I can report you too
Elski: I am having a bad game
Elski: Far from trolling and this so called int feeding
Elski: I am done trying to show you I CAN BAN W/E I WANT
Elski: You are just toxic
Elski: and wanting to rage
Elski: So muted
Elski: GP you cannot get out of Bronze presay
Elski: Because of bad things you do
Elski: Please report Kha'zix for being toxic. He is very toxic. Also GP for toxic. They need to learn to show repect
Elski: Ty
Game 2
Elski: GGWP
Elski: Yet another rage quit
Elski: FFa t 15
Elski: Dont be a dick
Elski: DRAGON
Elski: FK BOT
Elski: DRAGON NOW
Elski: ...
Elski: See
Elski: Now trash
Elski: Muted
Elski: And well now you cqan go F your self
Elski: K thanks
Elski: I said dragon
Elski: You said " No help top "
Elski: So yeah...
Elski: Sorry trash
Elski: Muting pings also
Elski: GGWP
Elski: Why report me
Elski: Because I muted Mid
Elski: And havent raged about top?>?
Elski: No I am not trolling
Elski: Imbims repsawn
Elski: Rowers dont
Elski: So please
Elski: And your reported
Elski: So yeah. Muted also
Game 3
Elski: Having fun Xin
Elski: LOL
Elski: Okay Xin
Elski: Sure
Elski: Gallo ult down
Elski: Sure
Elski: Thats why you are and always will be 
Elski: B5
Elski: I am your worst nightmare
Elski: Gallo to the save
Elski: Gallo real MPV
Elski: Varus amd xin must be duo
Elski: They are both as dumb as each other
Elski: I am right thou
Elski: Lol
Elski: Sure
Elski: Waste that Right
Elski: LOL
Elski: B5 Rift all day
Elski: WTF
Elski: TOP MORONS
Elski: So failed
Elski: WTF
Elski: WHY DO I HAVE TARDS AS TEAM MATES
Elski: Wake the fk up trashies
Elski: I am done
Elski: GGWP
Elski: GGWP Shecpell team mates over here
Elski: Xin please.. You arte so bad it isnt funny
Elski: I got trash team
Elski: Simple
Elski: They are so bad.. They dont even def a rift at TOP TOWER
Elski: Until it is at base
Elski: FF please
Elski: I dont want to waste my time with you people
Elski: You guys are so bad
Elski: It isnt funny
Elski: You should be B10
Elski: Not 5
Elski: Zed shhh
Elski: I owned top
Elski: You got 2 kills from ME
Elski: So shh
Elski: Sure Xin 1v1 after this game
Elski: Shhh
Elski: You got fed from trash
Elski: Nothing more
Elski: Sure moron
Elski: Sure
Elski: Muted. 1v1 after game


Really riot... Just because of this you claim i am toxic...
If you want riot I can upload the full chat log and show EVERYONE WHAT WAS REALLY SAID.
I get told to kill myself. I get called " autistic " { BTW My little girl has this } but yet they can play this fking game still. 
But I get reported for BANNING SOMEONE AND HEY CHAT BAN FOR IT!!

The kha'zix went full tilt.. Telling me I must be autistic to play like this.. WTF riot fair is fking fair.
You ban my other accounts for less then this bull shit and now yet again.. Being ban for baning a champion.

I can ban w/e I feel like but HEY.. Not when the team crys to all chat for 9 player report and your failure of a auto ban system kicks in.
FYI riot.. Ban me for what ever you want.. Accounts are only $50 with all the champions btw.
